reviews.review_msg: Helpless to the writing, everyone given poor marks. Worst prof I met!!!
Tim is a great instructor. You can learn a lot about writing good essays from him. He is a tough marker though. He is always willing to help if you have question,.
Tim is a great teacher. Really knows his stuff. He is a tough marker, but you can learn a lot from him about writing good essays.

Never ever take his class!!! He is such a tough marker! FAL is supposed to be a fairly easy course, but all of my classmates received quite low marks!  He doesn't like passive voice, so don't use it in your paper, he will reduce mark on it. His feedback on our draft paper is not helpful at all.His class is extremely boring!

Don't take this course with Daniel. He is a nice person but not a nice prof. Only if he likes you, you will get a good grade, otherwise, you will only get passing grade. I'm regret to see the comment on the rate my prof, which lead me to choose this prof.

Daniel Dunford is pretty hilarious, although at times he can be intimidating. Plenty of homework but not necessary as the class goes over it together as a group. His passion for teaching is shown through his thoughts and actions.
He is amazing,very passionate about the material. Always there to help and tells interesting stories. It is a pleasure listening to him.

LOVED THIS PROF! He is the best prof I have had so far. He was very nice and approachable. Very funny as well. Aside from teaching you FALX99 he teaches you life lessons! Very helpful for Academic Writing. I wish I could get another class with him.
This is a useful class as long as you are going to continue university studies and other professions related to what you learn in this class.
A lot of works,but nice teacher.
easy course.he's nice and easy-going! although exercises in writing aren't very helpful but this course is def. a GPA booster! i'll take his 199 class for sure next sem.
